puzzle.title: The Voice of Steadfastness
puzzle.intro: This individual is remembered for profound wisdom and guidance, offering counsel that transcends generations. Their words are a testament to piety and the importance of recognizing the blessings and trials from the Divine. Uncover the identity of this revered soul.
clues: I was not a prophet, but my wisdom is immortalized in the Divine Scripture.
My counsel to my child emphasized gratitude to Allah and avoiding shirk.
I taught about the importance of prayer, enjoining good, and forbidding evil.
I warned against arrogance and walking with insolence on the earth.
My name is given to an entire chapter in the Quran, highlighting my teachings.
My advice included patience in adversity, for indeed, that is from the most resolute of affairs.

location.label: Key Element
options: A wise counsel to an offspring
location.answer: A wise counsel to an offspring

outcome.label: Outcome
options: His wisdom was recorded in the Quran
Led his people to a new land
outcome.answer: His wisdom was recorded in the Quran

puzzle.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا لُقْمَـٰنَ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَشْكُرْ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌۭ
puzzle.verse: And We had certainly given Luqmān wisdom [and said], "Be grateful to Allāh." And whoever is grateful is grateful for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever denies [His favor] - then indeed, Allāh is Free of need and Praiseworthy. (31:12)
